summary: The module implements an example workflow for entity classification on relational graph datasets using a Relational Graph Convolutional Network (RGCN) built with MXNet and DGL. It prepares data, constructs a multi‑layer RGCN model with L2‑regularized weights, runs a training loop, and evaluates classification accuracy.
business_intent: Provide a reference implementation that showcases how to apply relational graph convolutional networks for node (entity) classification tasks, facilitating reproducibility and serving as a template for developers working with heterogeneous graph data.
